info:identity.info:description:
Sample application with SparkClusteringKMeans operator
This sample demonstrates the usage the Apache Spark's kmeans clustering machine learning library in a streams application. The SparkClusteringKMeans operator requires at start up the Spark model which is provided in directory etc/kmeans_model. A java application is provided in impl/src directory. This application can be used to rebuild the Spark model.
